description: a(n+1) = next smallest prime beginning with a(n) when written in binary, starting with 2.
prog: (Haskell)a055011 n = a055011_list !! na055011_list = iterate a208241 2  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 14 2013
crossrefs: A055011, A261200 and A261201 are all essentially the same sequence.
